messages.T_ERR_FLOAT_FORMAT: Wrong float numer '${value}' at line ${line} col ${col}
messages.T_ERR_BLOCK_COMMENT: Block comment '${value}' at line ${line} col ${col} is not closed
messages.T_ERR_TRAILING_ZERO: Float number '${value}' at line ${line} col ${col} cannot end with a zero
messages.T_ERR_LEADING_ZERO: Number '${value}' at line ${line} col ${col} cannot start with a zero
